title: Tag Registry
description: Validates the canonical tag registry grouped by tag class with lifecycle metadata for each tag entry.

^[a-z0-9_]+$.description: Collection of tag definitions for this class (e.g., skills, scene_type).

status.description: Lifecycle state controlling whether the tag can be used in canon datasets.

allow_inferred.description: If true, tooling may auto-suggest this tag during heuristic passes.

aliases.description: Optional list of alternate strings recognised by scrapers/taggers.

notes.description: Reviewer notes or context for this tag.
